title: Question about Mastery level 7 token
body:
Hi there,

So I have the 3 mastery level 7 tokens of a champ.
However, I am not sure how to get the mastery 7 without the blue shards.

One of the option is to get the token with the permanent champ, which I dont really understand.

> "Combine 3 Mastery tokens with a champ shard of the same champ, OR the champ permanent of the same champ, OR 600 blue essence, to unlock Level 7"
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/champion-mastery-levels-6-and-7-live-now

I have tried selecting the permanent champ option, but I cant combine the 3 tokens.

Any help? Is there something that I miss?
Please advise.

Thank you in advance.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Champion permanents are unlockable via chests, as are champion shards.

You'll need to have at least one of these for the champion you're trying to hit mastery 6/7 on OR the blue essence required.
